apps.name: iTorrent
apps.subtitle: Torrent client for iOS
apps.localizedDescription:
iTorrent officially in the AltStore!

It is an ordinary torrent client for iOS with Files app support and much more.

What can this app do:

‚Ä¢ Download in the background
‚Ä¢ Live Activity and Dynamic Island progress bar
‚Ä¢ Downloading on external drives
‚Ä¢ Sequential download (use VLC to watch films while loading)
‚Ä¢ Add torrent files from Share menu (Safari and other apps)
‚Ä¢ Add magnet links directly from Safari
‚Ä¢ Store files in Files app
‚Ä¢ File sharing directly from app
‚Ä¢ Download torrent by url
‚Ä¢ Download torrent by magnet
‚Ä¢ Show progress in Dynamic Island
‚Ä¢ Send notification on torrent downloaded
‚Ä¢ Web/WebDav Server
‚Ä¢ Select files download priority
‚Ä¢ Change UI to dark theme
‚Ä¢ Color personalization
‚Ä¢ RSS Feed

versions.localizedDescription:
* iOS 26 Support, iTorrent fully adopted new Liquid Glass design
* LibTorrent updated to version 2.0.11
* On first launch, app will ask if you'd like to use Cellular connection, instead of disabling it by default
* Added German localization by @soebbing in https://github.com/XITRIX/iTorrent/pull/369
* Added Italian localization by @fraucs in https://github.com/XITRIX/iTorrent/pull/385
* Added Polish localization by @yaptx in https://github.com/XITRIX/iTorrent/pull/391
* Added Spanish localization by @Deci8BelioS in https://github.com/XITRIX/iTorrent/pull/396

## New Contributors
* @soebbing made their first contribution in https://github.com/XITRIX/iTorrent/pull/369
* @fraucs made their first contribution in https://github.com/XITRIX/iTorrent/pull/385
* @yaptx made their first contribution in https://github.com/XITRIX/iTorrent/pull/391

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/XITRIX/iTorrent/compare/v2.0.14-1...v2.0.15-1
